name: Wedding
description: Celebrate your special day with a beautiful wedding ceremony and reception. This package includes an elegant venue, floral decorations, gourmet catering, and a live band and DJ for entertainment. Contact us at wedding@example.com for inquiries.
short_description: Elegant wedding package with venue, catering, and entertainment.
discount: Book before June 30, 2023, and receive a 10% discount.
review: We had an amazing wedding experience with this package. The venue was stunning, and the catering was delicious. The live band and DJ kept the party going all night!

name: Birthday Party
description: Throw a memorable birthday bash for yourself or a loved one. This package includes an exclusive use of the City Park Pavilion, themed decorations, a delicious chocolate cake, and entertainment by a magician and clown. Contact us at birthday@example.com for inquiries.
short_description: Fun birthday package with exclusive pavilion, cake, and entertainment.
discount: Book for a weekday celebration and receive a 10% discount.
review: We had a blast at the birthday party! The pavilion was a great venue choice, and the magician and clown were entertaining. The cake was a highlight! Amazing experience, unforgettable memories.

name: Anniversary Celebration
description: Honor the years of love and commitment with an elegant anniversary party. This package includes a luxurious hotel ballroom, red and gold decorations, and a live band for dancing. Contact us at anniversary@example.com for inquiries.
short_description: Luxurious anniversary celebration in a hotel ballroom with live band.
discount: Book in advance and receive a complimentary bottle of champagne.
review: Our anniversary celebration was perfect! The hotel ballroom was stunning, and the live band added to the elegance. We loved the complimentary champagne!

name: Retirement Party
description: Bid farewell to a colleague with a retirement party full of joy and memories. This package includes an office conference room and an option for a farewell gift. Contact us at retirement@example.com for inquiries.
short_description: Heartwarming retirement party in an office conference room.
discount: Enjoy a 15% discount for group bookings from your office.
review: Our colleague's retirement party was emotional and heartwarming. The office conference room worked well for the intimate gathering.

name: Engagement Party
description: Celebrate the beginning of a beautiful journey with a romantic engagement party. This package includes a rooftop lounge venue, a rustic chic theme, and a professional engagement photoshoot. Contact us at engagement@example.com for inquiries.
short_description: Romantic engagement party on a rooftop with a chic theme.
discount: Book before July 31, 2023, and receive a complimentary engagement photo album.
review: Our engagement party was so romantic, and the rooftop venue had amazing views. The engagement photoshoot was a lovely addition!

name: Baby Shower
description: Welcome the arrival of a new baby with a heartwarming baby shower. This package includes a community center venue, a gender-neutral theme, and an Amazon Baby Registry. Contact us at babyshower@example.com for inquiries.
short_description: Heartwarming baby shower in a community center.
discount: Receive a 10% discount when booking a baby photography session with our partner photographer.
review: The baby shower was lovely, and the community center was spacious. We appreciated the Amazon Baby Registry option!
